concept.title: Start here: choose your installation and setup experience
concept.shortdesc: You can choose from different content formats to guide you through the installation and setup of your hardware.

conbody.p: If needed, before you begin the installation and setup of your new system, you can familiarize yourself with the process by reviewing the Installation and setup high-level workflow.

The following content formats are available:
Installation and setup poster
Step-by-step instructions with links to additional content in an easy-to-use visual format.
Installation and setup guide
Step-by-step instructions in a guide format.
